content.p: Night light can help you get to sleep by displaying warmer colors at night. Select Night light settings to set things up.
To have an app start sending you notifications, go to Get notifications from these senders, and then turn on that app.
Make your battery last longer by choosing shorter times for screen and sleep settings.
When Storage sense is turned on, it'll free up space only when your PC is low on space. To clean up unused files now, select Configure Storage Sense or run it now > Clean now.
Tablet mode optimizes your device for touch, so you don’t have to use a keyboard and mouse. When tablet mode is on, apps open full-screen and taskbar and desktop icons are reduced.
To switch between open apps, select the Task View button on the taskbar, or press Alt + Tab.

tip.title: This page has a few new settings

content.p: Some settings from Control Panel have moved here, and you can copy your PC info so it’s easier to share.
To turn Bluetooth on or off without opening Settings, open action center and select the Bluetooth icon.
If you can't get your printer to work, try running the printer troubleshooter.
Swipe up with three fingers to display all your open apps, or tap an app once with two fingers to right-click.
See recent photos and send text from your Android phone. Select Add a phone to set it up.
If you don't see the wireless network you want, select Show available networks, select the one you want, and select Connect.
Download free themes from the Microsoft Store that combine wallpapers, sounds, and colors
Select which apps to use to listen to music, look at pictures, check mail, watch videos, and more.
Use Reset when you want to go back to the default apps that Microsoft recommends.

tip.title: Lock your PC in a second

content.p: To protect your private info and help keep your device safe, press Windows logo key + L before you walk away from your PC.
To choose the default apps that open your files, links, and more, go to Default app settings.

tip.title: Bring Family Safety to your phone

content.p: Use all of the digital safety features you already know, plus location sharing for the whole family.
Turn Narrator on and press the caps lock and spacebar keys to turn on scan mode. Then press the up and down arrow keys to read everything in an app or webpage.
Windows Security has options to help keep you protected online, maintain your device’s health, run periodic scans, manage your threat-protection settings, and more.

tip.title: Choose the right backup option for you

content.p: To have Windows back up your files to a safe place, choose where you want your files to go—to the cloud, an external storage device, or a network.

tip.title: Fix problems without resetting your PC

content.p: Resetting your PC can take a while. If you haven't already, try running a troubleshooter to resolve issues before you reset.
Depending on how you got Windows, activation will use a digital license or a product key.
